election_record.label: Virginia 1809 House of Delegates, Fauquier County

overview.note: "Col. Buckner and Mr. Clarkson, federalist, are elected delegates to the Virginia legislature for Fauquier County." Alexandria Daily Gazette, Commercial and Political (Alexandria, VA), April 27, 1809; Federal Gazette, April 29, 1809; and, United States' Gazette (Philadelphia, PA). May 1, 1809.

"We understand the utmost exertions were made by the democrats to carry their men, but to no avail -- The first named gentleman had a majority of 50, the last 40." Alexandria Daily Gazette, Commercial and Political (Alexandria, VA), April 27, 1809; Federal Gazette, April 29, 1809; and, United States' Gazette (Philadelphia, PA), May 1, 1809.

election_record.reference: Alexandria Daily Gazette, Commercial and Political (Alexandria, VA). April 27, 1809.
Federal Gazette and Baltimore Daily Advertiser (Baltimore, MD). April 29, 1809.
Leonard, Cynthia Miller, ed. The General Assembly of Virginia, July 30, 1619 - January 11, 1978: A Bicentennial Register of Members. Richmond: Virginia State Library, 1978.
